subject: [Radiance-general] Light Shelf Reflections
body:
I am hoping to see multiple reflections of the light beam reflected off the
light shelf top surface in both the floor and the ceiling (all of which are
mirror surfaces).

On Mon, Mar 11, 2013 at 10:40 AM, Jack de Valpine <jedev at visarc.com> wrote:
